department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
short_summary: Compressor Turbine Disk for King Air C90A Aircraft
description: Compressor Turbine Disk for the King Air C90A Aircraft
full_summary:
____________________

**Government Tender Announcement**

**Contract Title:** Compressor Turbine Disk for the King Air C90A Aircraft
**Procurement Reference:** PW-CAG-017-29164

**Competition Type:** Request for Proposal

**Description:**
Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) is soliciting proposals from qualified suppliers for the acquisition of Compressor Turbine Disks for Transport Canada's King Air C90A aircraft. The procurement is subject to the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), and other trade agreements as stated below.

**Bidder Qualification:**
Suppliers on the permanent list or able to meet qualification requirements can submit a proposal. Bidders are expected to meet the requirements outlined in the solicitation documents.

**Procurement Details:**

* Procurement Category: SRVTGD (Repair and Overhaul of Aircraft Components)
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Selective Tendering
* Evaluation Criteria: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
* Selection Criteria: Suppliers will be evaluated based on their ability to meet the requirements outlined in the solicitation documents.

**Trade Agreements:**
Suppliers are expected to comply with the following trade agreements:
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Other trade agreements as stated below.

**Deliverables:**
One (1) Compressor Turbine Disk, 1 quantity, for the King Air C90A aircraft, Serial No. LJ1200, Tail No. 692.

**Delivery Date:** October 16, 2023

**Additional Information:**
A Notice will be posted at least once a year on the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) to allow more Suppliers to become qualified for the Supply Arrangement T8493-140035 Series.

**Contact:**
Valérie Bourassa, Supply Officer
Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC)
11 Laurier Street, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5
Phone: 873-455-0980
Email: valerie.bourassa@tpsgc.gc.ca

**Important Note:** The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers
